Inc.","details":"Enables fund wallets to deposit to Morpho, Aave, and other DeFi protocols      while maintaining proper cost basis tracking and income classification.      Architecture:      - Uses InvestmentFacet for cost basis and valuation tracking      - Uses IncomeReceivableFacet for realized gain classification      - Supports any ERC-4626 compliant vault      Security:      - Only admin can deposit/withdraw (via AccessControl)      - Vault validation on first deposit (auto-registration)      - All external calls use SafeERC20","errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"params":{"caller":"Address attempting the call","functionSig":"Function selector that was called"}}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addToVaultPosition(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"assets":"Additional assets to deposit","investmentId":"Existing investment ID"},"returns":{"sharesReceived":"Amount of vault shares received"}},"depositToVault(address,uint256,string)":{"details":"This function:      1. Auto-registers the vault if not already registered (validates ERC-4626)      2. Creates an investment record (if new position) or updates existing      3. Approves the vault to spend assets      4. Deposits assets to vault      5. Records cost basis for proper P&L tracking","params":{"assets":"Amount of underlying assets to deposit","description":"Description for the investment record","vault":"ERC-4626 vault address"},"returns":{"investmentId":"The investment ID from InvestmentFacet","sharesReceived":"Amount of vault shares received"}},"exitVaultPosition(uint256)":{"params":{"investmentId":"Investment ID to exit"},"returns":{"assetsReceived":"Amount of underlying assets received","realizedGain":"Total profit classified as income"}},"getAllVaultPositions()":{"returns":{"positions":"Array of active vault positions"}},"getRegisteredVaults()":{"returns":{"_0":"Array of registered vault addresses"}},"getTotalVaultValue()":{"returns":{"totalValue":"Sum in asset terms (normalized to 18 decimals)"}},"getUnrealizedGains()":{"returns":{"unrealizedGain":"Total unrealized profit/loss"}},"getVaultPosition(uint256)":{"params":{"investmentId":"Investment ID"},"returns":{"position":"The vault position details"}},"isVaultRegistered(address)":{"params":{"vault":"Vault address to check"}},"packedSelectors()":{"details":"Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)","returns":{"_0":"Tightly packed bytes4 selectors"}},"previewDeposit(address,uint256)":{"params":{"assets":"Amount to deposit","vault":"Vault address"},"returns":{"sharesExpected":"Expected shares to receive"}},"previewWithdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"investmentId":"Investment ID","shares":"Shares to redeem"},"returns":{"assetsExpected":"Expected assets to receive","expectedGain":"Expected realized gain/loss"}},"registerVault(address,string)":{"details":"Can be called to pre-approve vaults, but depositToVault will auto-register if needed","params":{"name":"Human-readable name for the vault","vault":"ERC-4626 vault address"}},"unregisterVault(address)":{"details":"Does not affect existing positions, just removes from registered list","params":{"vault":"ERC-4626 vault address to remove"}},"updateAllVaultValuations()":{"returns":{"totalValue":"Sum of all vault position values"}},"updateVaultValuation(uint256)":{"params":{"investmentId":"Investment ID to update"},"returns":{"newValue":"Updated value in asset terms"}},"withdrawFromVault(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function:      1. Redeems shares from vault      2. Calculates realized gain/loss based on cost basis      3. Classifies gain as INTEREST income via IncomeReceivableFacet      4. Updates or exits investment record","params":{"investmentId":"Investment ID to withdraw from","shares":"Amount of shares to redeem (0 = all)"},"returns":{"assetsReceived":"Amount of underlying assets received","realizedGain":"Profit classified as income (can be negative for loss)"}}},"title":"VaultAdapterFacet","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AccessControl_CallerIsNotAuthorized(address,bytes4)":[{"notice":"Thrown when caller lacks required permissions"}]},"events":{"VaultDeposit(uint256,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when depositing to a vault"},"VaultRegistered(address,address,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when a vault is registered for tracking"},"VaultUnregistered(address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a vault is unregistered"},"VaultValuationUpdated(uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted when vault valuation is updated"},"VaultWithdrawal(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when withdrawing from a vault"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"VaultAdapter_init()":{"notice":"Initialize the vault adapter facet"},"addToVaultPosition(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add to an existing vault position"},"depositToVault(address,uint256,string)":{"notice":"Deposit assets to a vault with proper accounting"},"exitVaultPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"Fully exit a vault position"},"getAllVaultPositions()":{"notice":"Get all active vault positions"},"getRegisteredVaults()":{"notice":"Get all registered vaults"},"getTotalVaultValue()":{"notice":"Get total value of all vault positions"},"getUnrealizedGains()":{"notice":"Get unrealized gains across all positions"},"getVaultPosition(uint256)":{"notice":"Get a vault position by investment ID"},"isVaultAdapterInitialized()":{"notice":"Check if initialized"},"isVaultRegistered(address)":{"notice":"Check if a vault is registered"},"packedSelectors()":{"notice":"Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes"},"previewDeposit(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Preview a deposit to a vault"},"previewWithdraw(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Preview a withdrawal from a vault"},"registerVault(address,string)":{"notice":"Register a vault for tracking (optional - depositToVault auto-registers)"},"unregisterVault(address)":{"notice":"Unregister a vault (for depositToVault(address,uint256,string).details: This function:      1. Auto-registers the vault if not already registered (validates ERC-4626)      2. Creates an investment record (if new position) or updates existing      3. Approves the vault to spend assets      4. Deposits assets to vault      5. Records cost basis for proper P&L tracking

params.assets: Amount of underlying assets to deposit

returns.totalValue: Sum in asset terms (normalized to 18 decimals)

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

registerVault(address,string).details: Can be called to pre-approve vaults, but depositToVault will auto-register if needed

unregisterVault(address).details: Does not affect existing positions, just removes from registered list

returns.totalValue: Sum of all vault position values

withdrawFromVault(uint256,uint256).details: This function:      1. Redeems shares from vault      2. Calculates realized gain/loss based on cost basis      3. Classifies gain as INTEREST income via IncomeReceivableFacet      4. Updates or exits investment record

params.shares: Amount of shares to redeem (0 = all)

returns.realizedGain: Profit classified as income (can be negative for loss)

addToVaultPosition(uint256,uint256).notice: Add to an existing vault position

depositToVault(address,uint256,string).notice: Deposit assets to a vault with proper accounting

getTotalVaultValue().notice: Get total value of all vault positions

getUnrealizedGains().notice: Get unrealized gains across all positions

getVaultPosition(uint256).notice: Get a vault position by investment ID

isVaultRegistered(address).notice: Check if a vault is registered

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

previewDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Preview a deposit to a vault

previewWithdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Preview a withdrawal from a vault

registerVault(address,string).notice: Register a vault for tracking (optional - depositToVault auto-registers)

updateAllVaultValuations().notice: Update valuations for all vault positions

updateVaultValuation(uint256).notice: Update the valuation of a single vault position

withdrawFromVault(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw assets from a vault with income classification
